Tyrael found a lab and inserted the datachip in a computer. He had two
things to do.

Tyrael: Computer, open file Wyrm.dna.

The file opened and showed the complete genetic pattern of Burrock. He
wished he could have saved the remaining arm, but it had been in
another part of the ship.

Only then did Tyrael (and Nic too!) realize that Naga, who had been in
cryostasis, had perished with the destruction of the ship. Too bad, he
thought.

Tyrael: Computer, create a secure sterile airlocked compartment.

Behind the computer, a small chamber lit up.

Tyrael: Replicate dna.

In just a few seconds, in the cyberbiological part of the lab, the
instruments started producing new nanites comprised with the genetic
pattern.

Tyrael then set the process for a five cycle one after which the
nanites would be stored in the compartment. He turned to the other
datafile.

Tyrael: Well... What did that predacon engine marvel hold, I wonder?

After pressing a few buttons, he engaged the computer to decipher the
information that was contained on the part they had picked up.

Tyrael: This might take some times, but I will create the perfect
Tripredacus warrior...
